datasetVersion.specialPermissions: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.

fields.value: Muckleshoot Lessons: Lesson 14, Choral repetition & Muckleshoot Lessons: Muckleshoot Sound Drills

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Contents

  • 1 - Muckleshoot Lessons
    • 1) Lesson fourteen (cont. from Tape 58)
    • 2) Choral repetition D (cont.?) (Ernie Barr, Bertha McJoe).
  • 1 - Muckleshoot Lessons “Muckleshoot Sound Drills” (Bernice Tanewasha, Aug. 27-29, 1974)


From the Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.60; 95-19.61) University of Washington, Seattle
